website_summaries.verdict: This is a classic backpack that's made with students in mind, as it boasts lots of room and comfort-enhancing features.
pros: Sports a traditional style with ample pockets, including one designed especially for a water bottle
Padded back panel and S-shaped shoulder straps make it comfortable to carry
Comes in several colors, and backed by an impressive warranty
cons: Although it has a lot of space, it doesn't have a pocket designed especially for a laptop

customer_reviews.title: All things considered, I can give this no less than five stars.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the important part - the color. As her father, I appreciate that it holds together even though she insists on packing it full of HEAVY stuff. I haven’t looked inside, but I’m wondering if she isn’t taking an automotive class and rebuilding an engine in her room at night. Even though the color is light, it cleans up beautifully so far. All things considered, I can give this no less than five stars.
customer_reviews.author: alfisch

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack!!
customer_reviews.text: it came just as described and i love it. I got the same styled backpack for 6th grade it it was big enough for everything. It has several pockets but will stain easily i’m predicting. Comes with Lifetime warranty and i’m going into 7th grade this year and i’m very excited 😆
customer_reviews.author: faith hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Why would you buy anything other than a JanSport?
customer_reviews.text: This holds so much stuff. I have yet to fill it to max capacity, although I do try! The straps are very forgiving for the weight I put on it, and to top it all off, JanSport backs their product with a LIFETIME warranty (save your receipt)! The only caution I would give is that the light pink color does show dirt a little easier than other colors, but I can spot clean it super easy and quick with the durable fabric and mild cleaning solution, so for me, still not a drawback!!!
customer_reviews.author: Keri Ann

customer_reviews.title: Another Great Product From JanSport
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter that is in college and needs a large book bag. By large, I mean books, laptop, water bottle, pens, and umbrella. She loves this book bag. My older daughter is graduating from college this year and has used the same JanSport her entire four years in college. YMMV but my family believes JanSport products.
customer_reviews.author: Discerning Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Roomy for a student
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes it. A lot of room and pockets for books and lunch bag. We bought this because I have to get her other Jansport bag repaired. Not sure if she’ll go back to her previous jansport backpack because this one has so much more room.
customer_reviews.author: Twinsplus1

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy! Teen abuse certified!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my teen daughter who has a ton of heavy books. The price was reasonable and the color is very pretty. She's been using it for about 6 months and it's very sturdy and durable..she's a teen so she abuses it and its holding up.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, good looks
customer_reviews.text: It's heavy duty and stands up to my daughters high school schedule, where she doesn't have a locker this year, and has to carry all of her books in it to all her classes all day long. It also has space for her chrome book.
customer_reviews.author: C. Satterfield

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable, straps are too stiff and too close together
customer_reviews.text: Extremely uncomfortable and I'll fitting. Its light, which is nice, but the straps are so thick, stiff and awkward and they bruise my shoulders because they are sewed too close at the time. Granted, it's probably fine for a small child, as I got it to use an an adult, but I wish I'd just spent the extra money and ordered the smaller version.
customer_reviews.author: M Gray

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Today: the fabric still gets stuck and her teachers and family have all had to help with it. Today the water bottle netting totally ripped out at the bottom. Previous: The fabric is too wide around the zipper and it gets stuck all the time. It is very difficult to fix it and my grand daughter ends up walking around with it open all day
customer_reviews.author: Sonya G

customer_reviews.title: Good for Anyone!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Jansport bags for years now, and I'm currently a Junior in University. These bags are perfect for holding everything I need, they provide nice back support, and they last quite a while and are easy to clean. Definitely worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: spacious
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack! It's wide and can carry all her books. Last year we had a smaller backpack and struggled to gets books in and ended up always carrying some in her hand. This one is GREAT. Extra room and she says its comfortable on her back.
customer_reviews.author: UU Katze

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: My daughter needed a heavy duty backpack for school and this is perfect. The stitching wont rip out and its a great size for junior high school. Great purchase! Would definitely buy this again in another color for my sons.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty (but lightweight), perfect for school with fun colors to choose from. I have the pastel pink version and the color is the same in the picture. 2 Zippered compartments and side space for a water bottle are great features that come with this backpack. I've bought 2 jansport backpacks, and each one has lasted around 3 school years. Great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: big boi learning
customer_reviews.text: It's a cute backpack with several kinds of pockets. I really like it but after 7 months the only problem I have is how it can feel a little saggy if it's not completely packed. I understand that it's a big student backpack for a reason but sometimes I just don't carry as much. It would've been nice if it had some of those sidestraps to keep the contents compact. Overall it's a really good backpack!
customer_reviews.author: Laly A.

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what my granddaughter wanted. My 31 year old daughter still has her Janport from high school which also saw her through college. Quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Barb J

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and roomy
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack, sturdy and roomy. Holds all of the books, papers, computer, and minutiae of the everyday school life of a teenager. Love that Jansport backpacks survive multiple years of schooling.
customer_reviews.author: Sunnybrook

customer_reviews.title: Organizational tool
customer_reviews.text: Very large pockets to fit many things. I use it for a diaperbag. I love that it has so many compartments to fit individual items. It helps me stay organized.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Colby

customer_reviews.title: The only backpack brand I trust!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expect from the Jansport name. I have no doubt this will last my daughter’s school career.
customer_reviews.author: Heather W.

customer_reviews.title: Last backpack you will have to buy for awhile!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our Disney trip. Great quality backpack. We only purchase jansport backpacks. A great investment that you will have for years! Shipping was quick!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and great quality
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES this backpack!! Super great quality and super adorable. Exactly as shown!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look like picture
customer_reviews.text: JanSports quality up holds its reputation. Great size for a book bag or a diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: C. Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this backpack! Second one we have bought! It holds up very nice even after washing! Very spacious but not bulky!
customer_reviews.author: Shawnta McClinton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome backpack
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved this backpack. Roomy and nicely designed. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: glenda

customer_reviews.title: This bag is HUGE
customer_reviews.text: Probably a little too big for my 9yr old. But its pink and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Favorite backpack brand
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with this bag. It is perfect and has so many pockets!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No laptop pocket
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and color but they get dirty fast and there is not laptop pocket
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle James

customer_reviews.title: Great for nursing school
customer_reviews.text: Bought for nursing school, holds plenty of books & doesn’t feel heavy on my back
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Ungvarsky

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: Large enough to hold everything my high school daughter carries. Seems very sturdy. Love the pink color!
customer_reviews.author: S. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: So tired of carrying a purse for my stuff and the kids
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Head

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $40
customer_reviews.text: Lots of pockets and space. Plus, it’s really cute. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Gina M

customer_reviews.title: Daughter says "This is the one! " So far ...
customer_reviews.text: Daughter says "This is the one!" So far it holds up in the most cruel test know to mankind - HIGHSCHOOL!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Jakits

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect backpack for my middle schooler. Lots of room, good quality as always from Jansport.
customer_reviews.author: Christine S.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product and strong!!! My daughter is 6 years old and it’s perfect
customer_reviews.author: vanessa santaella

customer_reviews.title: Very roomy and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy with lots of room for a middle schoolers binders and notebooks. Several pockets of different sizes helps keep her organized. Would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa P.

customer_reviews.title: Great for middle & high school children
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack! My daughter is in 8th grade and this backpack is perfect for all her books to fit. Also has a water bottle holder on the side which is great!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: JanSport big backpack
customer_reviews.text: Excellent option. It is as big as you need to go to school
customer_reviews.author: Maythe Figueira Morillo

customer_reviews.title: Never go wrong with Jansport
customer_reviews.text: Spacious and big back that's perfect for this upcoming school year
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Solid backpack. Lots of room for all of of my daughter’s books and other items.
customer_reviews.author: TechGeek

customer_reviews.title: and super spacious with a lot of pockets
customer_reviews.text: Really really cute, and super spacious with a lot of pockets. It feels pretty high quality, which is good since the reason I had to buy this was because the strap on my last one broke off(I have a lot of books and stuff).
customer_reviews.author: Kenna

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and haven’t ripped yet! Amazing! Spacious and Great Quality!
customer_reviews.author: juc914

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed, I don't know how my daughter can put ...
customer_reviews.text: The backpack came but was missing a couple of zipper from the inside pockets :-(. I was very disappointed, I don't know how my daughter can put her stuff in there because they will all fall out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack. Well-made, room enough for everything one would need for school, an overnight stay, or a day at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: The O

customer_reviews.title: Jansport Best Backpacks
customer_reviews.text: tpurchased as a gift for a high school student it is what I expected of Jan sport and the recipient love it
customer_reviews.author: mzkakes70

product_meta.title: JanSport unisex-adult Big Student
product_meta.description: Our Big Student style is a backpack with lots of pockets. These are particularly useful for high school or college students where carrying large books and many different items ranging from digital tools to snacks become the norm. Large backpacks for college are a must today, plain and simple. Some may think that big backpacks are just too large, but our style and prints will make you forget the size because we make oversized backpacks look cool.
feature_bullets: Made in the USA or Imported

The big student backpack: the classic JanSport backpack look, with more space & pockets, The big student is great for high school & College students. A water bottle pocket & three front zipper pockets means more room for books, snacks, electronics & gear.

Your everyday, everywhere backpack: JanSport backpacks are popular at school for a reason. With colors & style that reflect your personality, room for books, water bottles, laptops & sports gear, your JanSport goes from school to fun as quickly as you do.

JanSport backpacks: JanSport backpacks are made with durable fabric, zippers & straps, in colors & designs to reflect your style. We stand by our packs for a lifetime, so carry your JanSport on your adventures, knowing we'll replace or repair any breaks.

We're about the journey: JanSport is about the discovery of fun, freedom & adventure. From your first school backpack & lunch bag to the messenger bag for your first interview, from running errands to chasing dreams, JanSport gear inspires your journey.
We're the original: JanSport began making backpacks in 1967. From lunch bags to fanny packs to laptop bags, JanSport gear is durable and functional.
